nodes.bodyText: this shouldn't be static
also refactor to singular performFormTranslation
Done
the check for  activityIntent == null has been removed, is that intentional?
https://github.com/OpenSRP/opensrp-client-native-form/pull/529/files#r535217012
Check Added
This can be simplified to getIntent().getBooleanExtra(JsonFormConstants.PERFORM_FORM_TRANSLATION, false) || NativeFormLibrary.getInstance().isPerformFormsTranslation();
Unless the idea is to allow JsonFormConstants.PERFORM_FORM_TRANSLATION to override the global config per form.
Yes exactly, I plan to override the global config-if any single form needs to be un-translated.
Could you add assertions to verify that a sample form is actually translated when the value is set to true and that it is left untranslated when the value is false?
Test cases added
Refer JsonFormActivityTest.java

Also test that the intent value can override the global value per form i.e.

set global to true and set intent to false -> should not translate form
set global to false and set intent to true -> should translate form
Required test cases added.
This test is not too relevant now, it can be removed.
Test cases removed
Please update this to the correct naming pattern. i.e 1.14.7.1-SNAPSHOT
